personalInfo.name: Mokshit Shah
personalInfo.title: Software Developer
personalInfo.description: Full-Stack Developer with a strong foundation in React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern web technologies.Currently building advanced video analytics solutions at CerebralZip, including object-tracking and timeline-driven interfaces. I specialize in crafting responsive, user-centric UIs and scalable backend systems that solve real business problems.Experienced in delivering production-ready applications, integrating APIs, optimizing performance, and maintaining clean, maintainable code. Passionate about clean architecture, performance optimization, and continuous improvement, with a strong focus on creating reliable products and great user experiences.
